key.name: dock-fixed
key.description: Dock is always visible

key.name: animation-time
key.description: Sets the time duration of the autohide effect.

key.name: show-delay
key.description: Sets the delay after the mouse reaches the screen border before showing the dock.

key.name: hide-delay
key.description: Sets the delay after the mouse left the dock before hiding it.

key.name: autohide
key.description: Enable or disable autohide mode

key.name: intellihide
key.description: Enable or disable intellihide mode

key.name: intellihide-option
key.description: Select type of intellihide mode

key.name: dock-edge-visible
key.summary: Leave dock edge visible when slid out
key.description: Enable or disable leaving dock edge visible when slid out

key.name: require-click-to-show
key.summary: Dock requires hover+click to show when window is maximized
key.description: Enable or disable requiring hover+click to show dock when window is maximized

key.name: require-pressure-to-show
key.summary: Require pressure to show dock (GS38+ only)
key.description: Enable or disable requiring pressure to show dock (GS38+ only)

key.name: pressure-threshold
key.description: Sets how much pressure is needed to show the dock.

key.name: opaque-background
key.description: Makes the background of the workspaces opaque improving readability when in autohide mode.

key.name: opaque-background-always
key.description: Makes the background of the workspaces opaque improving readability even when not in autohide mode.

key.name: background-opacity
key.description: Sets the opacity of the workspaces background when in autohide mode.

key.name: preferred-monitor
key.summary: Monitor on which to put the dock
key.description: Choose on which monitor to put the dock, use -1 for the primary one

key.name: extend-height
key.description: Makes the dock extend vertically to fill the screen.

key.name: top-margin
key.description: Sets the top margin when the dock is extended vertically.

key.name: bottom-margin
key.description: Sets the bottom margin when the dock is extended vertically.

key.name: customize-thumbnail
key.description: Customize the workspace thumbnail size.

key.name: thumbnail-size
key.description: Set the custom size for the workspace thumbnail.

key.name: workspace-captions
key.description: Enable or disable workspace captions.

key.name: workspace-captions-support
key.description: Enable or disable user theme support - Enable if workspace caption support is provided by user theme.

key.name: workspace-caption-items
key.summary: List of items placed in caption
key.description: List of items placed in the caption - allowed items are number, name, windowcount, windowapps, and spacer.

key.name: workspace-caption-windowcount-image
key.summary: Show workspace window count using images
key.description: Enable or disable using images for workspace window count.

key.name: workspace-caption-large-icons
key.summary: Show workspace window apps using large icons
key.description: Enable or disable using large icons for workspace window apps (taskbar).

key.name: toggle-overview
key.description: Toggle overview mode with right click

key.name: toggle-dock-with-keyboard-shortcut
key.summary: Enable keyboard shortcut to toggle dock
key.description: Enable keyboard shortcut to toggle the dock.

key.name: dock-keyboard-shortcut
key.description: Set the keyboard shortcut to toggle the dock.

key.name: dashtodock-hover
key.summary: Dock shown on Dash-To-Dock mouse over
key.description: Enable or disable Dash-To-Dock hover mode
